column1: Little Goat Diner////The more casual sister restaurant to Girl and the Goat. A diner that is so much more than that. A photo booth while you are waiting
column2: one side is a coffee/ pastry shop the other serves full meals. We had to have reservations for lunch. The goat chili was recommended by the server
column3: and they should know. I was hesitant but went with it and was so glad I did. Excellent
column5: mac and cheese and craft cocktails. Not an inexpensive linch but enjoyable nonetheless. $89 for three of is.
